name: procreation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of producing young animals or babies: Some people believe that sex should only be for the purpose of procreation. They support the argument that the purpose of marriage is procreation. See
procreate
More examplesFewer examplesWithout some new force promoting procreation, the global decline in fertility rates is unlikely to reverse.Cloning represents a giant step toward turning procreation into manufacture.Procreation isn't something to be taken lightly.
